about_the_game: Prepare for grape harvesting season! With the ERO Grapeliner Series 7000, a new high-performance grape harvester becomes available at virtual dealerships near your farm. Authentically digitized for Farming Simulator 22, the machine from ERO, a leading manufacturer of vineyard machinery in Germany, harvests the delicious fruit with extreme care and efficiency. Perfect for your juicy business on lush hillsides striped with vines.
detailed_description: Prepare for grape harvesting season! With the ERO Grapeliner Series 7000, a new high-performance grape harvester becomes available at virtual dealerships near your farm. Authentically digitized for Farming Simulator 22, the machine from ERO, a leading manufacturer of vineyard machinery in Germany, harvests the delicious fruit with extreme care and efficiency. Perfect for your juicy business on lush hillsides striped with vines.
legal_notice: © 2021 GIANTS Software GmbH. Published and developed by GIANTS Software. Farming Simulator, GIANTS Software and its logos are trademarks or registered trademarks of GIANTS Software. All rights reserved. All manufacturers, agricultural machinery, agricultural equipment, names, brands and associated imagery featured in this game in some cases include trademarks and/or copyrighted materials of their respective owners. The agricultural machines and equipment in this game may be different from the actual machines in shapes, colours and performance. All other names, trademarks and logos are property of their respective owners.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.14 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3330 or AMD FX-8320 or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660, AMD Radeon R7 265 or better (min 2GB VRAM, DX11/DX12 support)
  • Storage: 7 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: These system requirements can´t cover all possible system configurations so issues could occur that influence the functionality in some cases.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.14 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-5675C or AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or Radeon RX 570 or better (min 6GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 7 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: These system requirements can´t cover all possible system configurations so issues could occur that influence the functionality in some cases.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Home (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3330 / AMD FX-8350 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 (2 GB) / Radeon R9 390X (8 GB)
  • Storage: 7 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card
  • Additional Notes: These system requirements can´t cover all possible system configurations so issues could occur that influence the functionality in some cases.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Home (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-5675C / AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 1060 (6 GB) / Radeon RX 570 (8 GB)
  • Storage: 7 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card
  • Additional Notes: These system requirements can´t cover all possible system configurations so issues could occur that influence the functionality in some cases.
